German[edit]

German Wikipedia has an article on:
Polizei
Wikipedia de

Etymology[edit]

From Latin politia.

Pronunciation[edit]

  • IPA(key): /ˌpoliˈt͡saɪ̯/, [po.li.ˈt͡saɪ̯]
  • Rhymes: -aɪ̯
  • Hyphenation: Po‧li‧zei
  • Audio
    		(file)
  • Audio
    		(file)

Noun[edit]

Polizei f (genitive Polizei, plural Polizeien)

  1. (law enforcement) police

Declension[edit]
